name: sc-prisma-extractor
description: A CLI tool to extract your Prisma schema into usable TypeScript interfaces and a detailed metadata JSON file.

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch prisma --ext ts,prisma --exec "npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.validate-config: node -e "const { validateConfig, loadConfig } = require('./dist/utils'); try { validateConfig(loadConfig()); console.log('âœ… ConfiguraÃ§Ã£o vÃ¡lida!'); } catch (error) { console.error('ðŸŸ¥', error.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
